net.sf.ehcache.event
Enum NotificationScope

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Enum<NotificationScope>
      net.sf.ehcache.event.NotificationScope
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<NotificationScope>
public enum NotificationScope
extends java.lang.Enum<NotificationScope>

This enumeration defines valid values for event listener notification scope. By default an event listener will be open to listening for events created on all nodes (ALL). You may also specify to receive only LOCAL events or only REMOTE events.

Since:
2.0
Author:
Geert Bevin

Enum Constant Summary
ALL
          Receive all events
LOCAL
          Receive only events generated by this CacheManager
REMOTE
          Receive only events generated by another CacheManager

shouldDeliver

public boolean shouldDeliver(boolean isRemote)
Determine whether an event should be delivered under this notification scope.

Parameters:
isRemote - Whether the event is local or remote
Returns:
True if the event should be delivered to a listener with this notification scope
